descriptionHTML:
A complete watch face to give you easy access to forecast and weather data, inspired by material design.

The sky on your wrist.

Forecast: Touch the sun or moon, to see a 5 day forecast for your current location.

If it says "No data":
- Your phone is trying to fetch forecast data, wait a little while and try again.


Works with Round, Square and Chin Watches.

Android Wear 2.0 users: This app is now standalone, you just need to allow the app location permission to fetch Weather and Forecast data based on your current location. If your watch does not have a built in GPS or Internet connection, it will use your paired smartphone as a location and internet provider.

Features:

§ Material Design

§ Customize: Choose between material colors to change your watch's theme.
- (Tap the time panel, or go to the watch face settings)

§ Sun moves from dawn to sunset!

§ Battery Level

§ Live weather and forecast data. ( Powered by OpenWeatherMaps )

§ Temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheits.

§ 8 different moon phases that changes automatically. ( does not require internet access )

§ Compatibility with all watches models in the Market

§ Animated clouds movement. ( Can be turned off in settings)

The aSun Material Weather Watch Face is designed for you, who enjoy the day as much as the night.

Time is not measured by clocks, but by moments. During your day, the sun will move on your watch face screen.

There are plenty of watch faces out there, but we wanted to make something unique.

We believe that simplicity is synonymous of greatness and style. No matter where you are, aSun material watch face will fit with your modern lifestyle, and will keep you up to date with the weather and forecast information.

only for Android Wear devices.
Hope you enjoy!

Learn more about our work:
www.pifox.io

(If you find any bugs, problems or performance issues, please report them and we will fix asap.)
comments: Updating my review.  Installation was a little wonky on the first attempt, but smooth on the second.  Set permissions on my phone for location based weather and that was it.  Beautiful and simple interface on watch for settings and a clean looking watch face have earned this a 5 star rating from me.  I looked for a good material design watch face long ago, and this one fits exactly what I was looking for.  It seems to be good on battery life, although I will wouldn't be upset to have a phone battery indicator in addition to the watch battery.
Very nice and clean design. Would like the current temperature display on the main screen though - maybe opposite battery indication.
Really like the simplicity of the material design of this watch face. It is nice to have the weather and battery status available at a glance. Definitely work trying if you like the material design.
I absolutely love the design of the watch face. I just wish that it had the ability to show the phone's battery and notifications on ambient mode.

Pretty nice Nice, clean, easy to read watchface. Only thing worth mentioning is that the date shows up ending in 'th' even when it should end in 'nd' or 'rd' so 23th of September instead of 23rd for example .
recentChanges: - The app is now full standalone.

( it is required to allow the location permission which will be prompted from a notification in your watch, if weather does not work, consider checking if your location is turned on, you should also turn on the location services on your phone if your watch does not have on-board GPS.
If it sill does not work, try resetting the watch face, rebooting the watch or reinstalling the app
